sglaine,
 
 You and I go back a ways, so take this as advice from a friend.
 
 You need to relax. Your comments are getting more and more out there, and you're resorting to personal attacks and name calling, which is always unacceptable. You'd be out on your ear right now at FTE, even in the glory days of the Pig Pen.
 
 Everyone has been very calm and considerate of you so far, for the most part, and I applaud them for that. However, lately you've done far more to discredit yourself than you have to advance your ideas. Simply because someone disagrees with you doesn't mean they're brain washed or ignorant. You have to consider/understand the oppositions side of the arguement in order to truly understand yours, remember that.
 
 You've got some valid points, but you need to present them calmly and logically, simply repeating them doesn't make them right. You need to research them and provide some supporting evidence.
